name.context: Label for the name field when creating/editing an activity

emptyNameError.context: Error message to inform user that the activity name is a required field

instructions.context: Label for the instruction field when creating/editing an activity

submissionType.context: Label for the submission type field when creating/editing an assignment

completionType.context: Label for the completion type field when creating/editing an assignment
